87 template<int stacksize> class Son {
88 public:
89  Son(){ memset(&_son, 0, sizeof(_son)); }
90 
91 #if defined __link
92  void set_handle(link_phy_t handle){ son_set_handle(&_son, handle); }
93 #else
94  void reset(son_t * obj){ lseek(obj->phy.fd, 0, SEEK_SET); }
95 #endif
96 
101  int fileno() const {
102 #if defined __link
103  if( _son.phy.handle == 0 ){
104  return 0;
105  } else {
106  return _son.phy.fd;
107  }
108 #else
109  return _son.phy.fd;
110 #endif
111  }
112 
118  int create(const char * name){ return son_create(&_son, name, _stack, stacksize); }
119  int append(const char * name){ return son_append(&_son, name, _stack, stacksize); }
120  int open(const char * name){ return son_open(&_son, name); }
121  int close(bool close_all = false){ return son_close(&_son, close_all); }
122  int seek(const char * access, son_size_t * data_size){ return son_seek(&_son, access, data_size); }
124  int to_json(const char * path){ return son_to_json(&_son, path); }
125

148  int write(const char * key, const char * v){
149  if( v ){
150  return son_write_str(&_son, key, v);
151  } else {
152  return son_write_null(&_son, key);
153  }
154  }
155 
162  int write(const char * key, i32 v){ return son_write_num(&_son, key, v); }
163  int write(const char * key, u32 v){ return son_write_unum(&_son, key, v); }
164  int write(const char * key, float v){ return son_write_float(&_son, key, v); }
165  int write(const char * key, bool v){
166  if( v ){
167  return son_write_true(&_son, key);
168  } else {
169  return son_write_false(&_son, key);
170  }
171  }
172  int write(const char * key, const void * v, son_size_t size){ return son_write_data(&_son, key, v, size); }
173  int write_open_data(const void * v, son_size_t size){ return son_write_open_data(&_son, v, size); }
174  int read_str(const char * access, char * str, son_size_t capacity){ return son_read_str(&_son, access, str, capacity); }
175  i32 read_num(const char * access){ return son_read_num(&_son, access); }
176  u32 read_unum(const char * access){ return son_read_unum(&_son, access); }
177  float read_float(const char * access){ return son_read_float(&_son, access); }
178  int read_data(const char * access, void * data, son_size_t size){ return son_read_data(&_son, access, data, size); }
179 
180  son_t & eon(){ return _son; }
